None.Name: Celestial Blade
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, unit casts a lance of light that deals 70 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 110 in total.

None.Name: High Guard
None.Description: Activate to bind to a friendly building. Cannot attack while bound.

None.Name: Surge of Strength
None.Description: The affected building gains Surge of Strength and deals 85% more damage.
